Description of incident: ground(ctrl) operates social networking community websites focused on musicians, informed customers of a data breach to their website. The information breached included e-mail addresses and passwords. The company did inform customers that their credit card information was never stored with them and was not at risk.For those affected, the company is recommending that usernames and passwords be changed. For questions individuals can call 1-877-463-2875 or via email at security@groundctrl.com.
